attributes.text: @dev default minimal auction duration and also the time for that auction is extended when it's about to end (endTime - now < EXTENSION_DURATION)
@dev mapping to store eth amount that is ready to be withdrawn (used for faulty eth-bids)
@dev minimal bid increase in base points

AuctionBuyOut(uint256).details: event that emits when auction is bought out

AuctionCancelled(uint256).details: event that emits when auction is canceled

AuctionCreated(uint256,uint128).details: event that emits when auction is created

AuctionFinished(uint256).details: event that emits when auction is finished

AvailableToWithdraw(address,uint256,uint.details: event that's emitted when user can withdraw ETH from the AuctionHouse

BidPlaced(uint256,uint256).details: event that emits when bid is placed

MinimalDurationChanged(uint256,uint256).details: event that's emitted when minimal auction duration changes

ProtocolFeeChanged(uint256,uint256).details: event that's emitted when protocolFee changes

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

EXTENSION_DURATION.details: default minimal auction duration and also the time for that auction is extended when it's about to end (endTime - now < EXTENSION_DURATION)

minimalStepBasePoint.details: minimal bid increase in base points

readyToWithdraw.details: mapping to store eth amount that is ready to be withdrawn (used for faulty eth-bids)
